title: should i get project yi or battlecast skarner

replies.body:
Project Yi is the better skin from a design perspective, cooler Quotes too,
And like Nya Hop said, he looks badass as fuck in his ultimate.

(this is coming from someone who plays Skarner and hates Yi, so you know I'm not biassed)
ditto with play skarner hate yi part. same opinion. the battlecast skarner is actually really cuddy in comparison

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEiz8vlx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-13T11:46:02.924+0000)
>
> ditto with play skarner hate yi part. same opinion. the battlecast skarner is actually really cuddy in comparison

well its not your choice its the people who fucking want to help me an not be a cocky piece of whatever
don't know what the hell you are on, but that statement literally translates into "The yi skin is better than the skarner one"

Woah man whats the rage for? 
You asked: 'which skin is better'
and Talon said: 'yes i agree with Sesshomaru that i prefer to play Skarner, but the Yi skin is better'

how is that at all deserving of rage?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEiz8vlx,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2015-12-13T17:53:06.451+0000)
>
> Woah man whats the rage for? 
> You asked: 'which skin is better'
> and Talon said: 'yes i agree with Sesshomaru that i prefer to play Skarner, but the Yi skin is better'
> 
> how is that at all deserving of rage?

read my name im joking XD
Voted Battlecast Skarner coz it's so much cooler in game. Yi looks coo during his ultimate but Battlecast Skarner is like a Tank ahahaha.

> [{quoted}](name=Nya Hop,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZEiz8vlx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-13T08:13:50.149+0000)
